name: Red v. Blue
description:
Description: The goal is to defeat the opposing player while using the map and movement to your advantage.

Instructions: The controls for Red are W, A, and D to move, and S to attack. The controls for Blue are the Up, Left, and Right arrows to move, and the Down arrow to attack. Each player can take 10 hits before they die. Some blocks on each level allow players to jump through them from below. If you fall off the map, you die, obviously.
